label: Complete panoramic view of the defences of Sebastopol & entrenched camp of the allies external & internal; From mount Sapoune to Kasmiecsh Bay embracing the whole of the works thrown up by the allies and the defences raised; Prise du Mont Sapoune jusqua la baie de Kamiesch montront les ouvrages constrints par les allies et les defenses.
